:::Hurricane/Treadshot/Bluestreak/Andromeda/Calibos:::

::Hurricane and Treadshot run out to the battle. Hurricane transforms to 
beast mode and tries to charge Rage, while Treadshot fires 25 shots::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Andromeda gets back to base and waits at the CR chambers.  Eventually 
Bluestreak emerges::
Bluestreak: Hey, im alive!  Thats about the second time ive been placed in a 
death situation!
::Andromeda and Bluestreak decide that theyre being a little too loud, so 
they go to there quarters::
Andromeda: For a second i thought id lost you.
Bluestreak: Ya cant keep me down!
::They kiss and lie down in bed.  Now lets give them some privacy for 
awhile...::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Calibos has a spark attack in his sleep. Hes dead jim::
